name: Squadron Red
description:
**This game is intended to be played on Windows**

**Please read the whole Description**

Thank you so much for deciding to play my game, I have been working on this game for a while and I wanted to release a tech-demo for people to give feedback. I am working on getting better textures for the ground. Please give me feedback so I can improve the game!

Controls:

WASD: control the ship

Space: to shoot

Escape: Back to the menu

Also I know its like 1 min of gameplay but tell me:

How far you got

How many points

How long it took you to get to the end

Music:

Artist: Scott Buckley

Song: Catalyst

1 thing to note:

1. This is very early access so don't be too harsh on me

Not much else to say other then:

ENJOY!
